data.text: @Mrhockey1231 @CTVNews I just looked up the information, and it is correct. Except it is slightly higher since the total deaths are from today. Is it misinformation to report correct death amounts from covid?
@CTVNews I thought he mentioned before that he believes in so called freedoms. Why does he not want you to have the freedom to decide to vaccinate your child if you choose to do so?
@CTVNews Finally someone in Florida is doing the right thing how do we get Canada on board?

@CTVNews How can anyone like Florida's actions?  Although Covid appears to be wanting to is not defeated.  Why would you not want to give your child the best chance to avoid it or to fight it?  Will never again visit Florida!!
@LucGira18928499 @CTVNews Lol you don’t have a clue. It isn’t complicated when you have dual citizenship
@CTVNews Ya the vaccine is really safe 🙄🙄 https://t.co/neBJhMuEE2
